body.name: Holstein Housewares - 5 Cup Drip Coffee Maker - Convenient and User Friendly with Permanent Filter, Borosilicate Glass Carafe, Water Level Indicator, Auto Pause/Serve and Keep Warm Functions, Red

features: MORNING CUP - Freshly brewed and rich-tasting coffee at the ready! Convenient and user-friendly one-touch operation. And no need to wait, auto pause and serve function means you can pour a cup of coffee before the brewing cycle is completed.

COMES WITH EVERYTHING YOU NEED - Measuring spoon and removable cone filter is included with each coffee maker, so there’s no need for wasteful paper filters. Glass carafe has easy-to-read text so you can keep a close eye on your coffee levels.
GREAT ADDITION TO YOUR KITCHEN - Space-saving compact design takes up less of a footprint on your countertop. The bold and vibrant design adds a lovely pop of color to your kitchen décor.

WHO WE ARE - Holstein Housewares strives to make cooking and entertaining easy by simplifying life in the kitchen. We develop a special blend of products so you can create endless recipes for all types of lifestyles, from healthy meals to guilty pleasures.

WARRANTY - Holstein Housewares offers a 1-year limited warranty to purchase worry-free. A user manual is included in the packaging (and available digitally) with easy instructions on how to use the product.
body.description: Start your morning with a freshly brewed and rich-tasting cup of coffee with Holstein Housewares 5CUP Coffee Maker. Its space-saving compact design takes less footprint on your countertop and the item will add a splash of color with its pepper red. For on-the-go moments, the auto pause and serve function lets you stop and serve your cup of coffee before the brewing cycle finishes. The removable filter basket and measuring spoon included simplify your morning pick-me-up routine and allow you to save money on paper filters. Enjoy your favorite blend any day with Holstein Housewares 5CUP Coffee Maker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Coffee Pot
reviews.reviewText: If you need a small but cute coffee pot this one is a good buy. It takes up little counter space and makes a good cup of coffee with one on deck. We even took ours on a 6 day road trip last month. It comes with a reusable filter basket or you can use a cone style paper filter, or both. It's basic, functional, inexpensive and comes in several nice colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the features you need!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new small coffee maker. I saw this online and put it on my Christmas list. It fills the bill. It's small but makes 5 cups of coffee. It's easy to clean. It comes in several different colors. I got the blue and love it.It's hard to find a coffee maker that is this small, I looked everywhere. Most of them are big and would take up a lot of counter space. It's a very good product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No stainless steel and does everything right but
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to love this coffee maker from the moment I opened the box but it was not what I expected. It is made of a thin plastic and at first seems insubstantial and fragile. It does have what I have looked for and what is important to me - no stainless steel. I live less than a mile from the Atlantic ocean and even less distance from a large bay: stainless steel rusts here - always. The coffee maker is efficient and takes up little counter space. The coffee comes out fast and hot and stays hot for the hour or so I leave it. I love the color - red. It takes up little room. I don't think the taste of coffee has anything to do with a drip machine so I can't rate that. I do think I will come to really love it: for now, it fits my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I gave it 4 stars on flavor.......was I found the "basket" didn't quit brew my fresh ground coffee strong enough. Even though I put in the same amount of ground coffee beans......it came out weak. The little scoop they give was too small for me. I went back to my unbleached brown coffee filter and used my own scoop.......and coffee came out great. Love the Color......matches what I have in my kitchen. And it again is fast & quiet. Some complained about it being cheap plastic.......I didn't find this.......it was the same as my Mr. Coffee Maker. M.C. noisy and grounds got into the area where you poor in the water....a pain to clean. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Barely makes 3 cups.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item because 1) I wanted a coffee maker that made more than 2 1/2 cups of coffee and 2) it was the perfect teal color. But it is NOT as advertised. It will barely make 3 cups. The carafe holds 25 ounces (740 ml) ofwater. A cup, here in the good old USA, is 8 ounces. Let's do the math. 8 ounces x 5 equals 40 ounces (1183 ml). So how does a 25 ounce carafe make 5 cups? The answer is it doesn't. It makes barely 3 cups when you allow for the water absorbed by the coffee grinds. It makes 5 just-over-a-HALF cup servings. Personally, I don't do half cup servings, and I don't know anyone who does. I hate it when merchants flat out lie in their ads. Or maybe Chinese cups are 5 ounces? Whatever the case, if you want a 5 cup coffee maker this is not it. You might try Krupps. I have a 4 cup Krupps coffee maker. It's old, but still works. It measures a cup as 8 ounces. It makes 4 cups (2 1/2 mugs). Four 8 ounce cups. The Krupps carafe is larger than this one, which claims to make 5. So much for truth in advertising. I hate to return it because it is so pretty, but I wanted a bigger coffee pot, not a smaller one. So another merchant lies and now I have to trek all the way to the Post Office in the next town to return this thing. There should be a law against this kind of thing. Oh, wait, there is. Amazon just doesn't enforce it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Perfect
reviews.reviewText: I have a tiny kitchen, so downsizing from a large coffee maker to this one made sense. It was well packaged and brews 5 cups very quickly. I picked it for the color and the size. Works well and so simple to clean. It comes with a basket to add your grounds and the other basket is also removable for easy-peasy cleaning. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Why is it SO SLOW?
reviews.reviewText: I'm the only coffee drinker in my home, so I love having a small coffee maker which doesn't take up precious counter space. I've used some of the small pot Mr. Coffee makers for a while now, but found this one on sale on Amazon and figured I'd give it a try. I wish I hadn't.It takes quite a bit longer (a difference of several minutes) to brew the same amount of coffee.It doesn't have an auto shut-off for the heating element/plate either. I'm notoriously forgetful, and it's nice to have the added safety of an auto-off heating plate - this doesn't have one.I just can't get my coffee to taste right out of it either. I've had it now for a couple of months. I followed the initial cleaning instructions. I have since made sure to keep the coffee pot clean, periodically do a deep clean on the reusable filter and basket, use cold filtered water, etc. I'm using the exact same coffee as usual and in the same amounts as well. Somehow, my coffee just isn't as good. It's almost burnt in aroma, and more bitter in taste.Lastly, I can't manage to pour out of the pot without getting water or coffee all over the place. I try to pour slowly, or quickly, or somewhere in the middle, and almost every time I manage to get the liquid within running down the side of the pot and onto the counter instead of into my mug. I give up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it why it is small and it fits perfectly in my room because I get up early in the morning and have coffee and you don’t hear it to perking sound why it makes you a delicious cup of coffee and the price is right.
Colour is accurate to picture and it’s a nice compact size. I saw some reviews of people complaining on it being cheaply made, but it’s been working great for me and no issues on the quality.
Muy hermosa, ese color tan vivo, que mi cocina se ve más alegre, LA RECOMIENDO claro que volveré a comprar otra más adelante.
Very well made and just the right size. Love the colour and makes excellent coffee. Great value for this item.

I don’t drink coffee but had a coffee drinker visit over the holidays! This made the perfect amount for 2 cups! Now I just keep it on my counter for friends who pop by! I finally have coffee for them to drink! And the yellow, so cute!
Coffee maker looks very elegant. Love the compact design and makes great tasting coffee fast. We use paper filter and it works great. Very good quality and the white/gold design, makes it so unique.
